#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
int main(){
	int n,k,m,i,j;
	char c;
	int count1,count2,count3;
	char str[1000001];
	scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
	scanf(" %s",str);
	m=n/k;
	for(i=0;i<k;i++){
		count1=0;
		count2=0;
		count3=0;
		for(j=0;j<m;j++){
			if(str[i+j*k]=='a')
				count1++;
			if(str[i+j*k]=='b')
				count2++;
			if(str[i+j*k]=='c')
				count3++;	
		}
		if(count1>=count2 && count1>=count3)
			c='a';
		else if(count2>=count1 && count2>=count3)
			c='b';
		else
			c='c';
		for(j=0;j<m;j++)
			str[i+j*k]=c;				
	}
	for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		printf("%c",str[i]);
	return 0;
}
